entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Calgary
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:52 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 10:51 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.9°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
